full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BKA' GDAMS KYI RNAM PAR THAR PA BKA' GDAMS CHOS 'BYUNG GSAL BA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @417A *, , BKA' GDAMS KYI RNAM PAR THAR PA BKA' GDAMS RIN PO CHE GSAL BA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA LO SUM STONG DRUG RGYA SO GCIG 'DAS PA NA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, BLA MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG LA BRTEN NAS, PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,MNYAM MED THUB PA'I RING LUGS GSAL MDZAD PA'I, ,JO BO RJE DANG 'JAM MGON YAB SRAS KYI, ,LTA SPYOD GTZANG MA'I RNAM THAR LEGS BSHAD PA'I, ,BKA' GDAMS CHOS 'BYUNG GSAL BA'I SGRON ME 'DI, ,MDO SNGAGS BSHAD SGRUB DRI MA MED PA'I RGYUN, ,YUL DUS MTHA' 'DIR GONG 'PHEL RGYUR DMIGS TE, ,DA RA BA PAndI TA YI SKYE MING GIS, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED SPAR GYI GTER DU BSGRUBS, ,'DIS MTSON BDAG GZHAN DUS GSUM DGE BA'I MTHUS, , RGYAL BSTAN SNYING PO ZHVA SER RING LUGS KYIS, ,BSTAN PA RIN CHEN NAM YANG MI NYAMS SHING, ,PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR SHOG ,'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,
